message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the full $1000000 in this round. Given that any delay only causes my share to discount by 20% per round while your value remains unchanged, you wonâ€™t gain by waiting. Thus, accepting this offer now is as good for you as any later alternative. Let's settle immediately!
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm offering you a chance to take $50000 right now.  Every round you wait, that amount shrinks. It's time to be practical.

Bob, given that my share decreases in value each round due to inflation, accepting your offer of $50000 now is in my best interest. Waiting will further erode my effective gain, so it's practical to settle here.
